title: Casual sans caps used for FarmVille logo
content:
Hey I have to re-create a logo with the Farm Ville type. Does anyone know where I can d/l a free version? Or something closely similar to this:

[http://jennylawrence.files.wordpress.com/2009/10/farmville-logo1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014094856/http:/jennylawrence.files.wordpress.com/2009/10/farmville-logo1.jpg "http://jennylawrence.files.wordpress.com/2009/10/farmville-logo1.jpg")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [farmville-logo1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014094856/http:/typophile.com/files/farmville-logo1.jpg) | 35.81 KB |
author: kimberlymariah

comments.content: My guess would be that that was a hand drawn logo.
You might also try poking around [http://comicraft.com/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014094856/http:/comicraft.com/fonts/ "http://comicraft.com/fonts/") and see if you can find something.
[Burbank](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014094856/http:/new.typographica.org/2008/typeface-reviews/burbank/) is the best typeface in this genre.
